item.title: 预制菜新国标过审：餐厅是用需明示
item.guid: 预制菜新国标过审：餐厅是用需明示
item.description:
According to a recent report by Yicai, the draft "National Food Safety Standard for Pre-prepared Dishes" led by the National Health Commission has passed review and will soon be open for public comment. 据第一财经日前报道，由国家卫健委主导的《预制菜食品安全国家标准》草案已通过审查，即将向社会公开征求意见。

The report states that at that time, there will be a unified definition for the "identity" of pre-prepared dishes, and whether and how catering establishments use pre-prepared dishes will also be included in the scope of information disclosure for the first time. Some experts also suggest that the aforementioned information about pre-prepared dishes should be mandatorily disclosed. 报道称， 届时预制菜「身份」将有统一说法，餐饮门店是否使用、如何使用预制菜，也将首次纳入信息披露范畴。 也有专家建议，预制菜的上述信息应强制披露。

Recently, Luo Yonghao questioned Xibei's use of pre-prepared dishes for some of its meals and the unreasonable pricing, which Xibei vehemently denied, sparking widespread attention. The pre-prepared dish industry is also under scrutiny. 近期，罗永浩质疑西贝部分餐品为预制菜，且存在价格不合理等情况，而西贝断然否认引发广泛关注的当下，预制菜行业也备受关注。

According to experts involved in the drafting, "The standard mainly specifies definitions and food safety indicator requirements." The draft makes unified provisions for the classification, raw materials, processing technology, storage, transportation, and inspection methods of pre-prepared dishes, and for the first time proposes mandatory indicators such as "no preservatives added." 据参与起草的专家透露，「该标准主要是规定定义和食品安全指标要求。」草案对预制菜的分类、原料、加工工艺、贮存运输及检验方法作出了统一规定，并首次提出「不添加防腐剂」等强制性指标。

Compared with the existing 141 group and local standards, the national standard clauses focus more on the "safety bottom line," providing direct basis for supervision and enforcement. 与现行 141 项团体、地方标准相比，国标条款更聚焦「安全底线」，为监管执法提供直接依据。

As the province with the largest output value of pre-prepared dishes nationwide, Guangdong has issued 8 provincial local standards and launched the country's first "pre-prepared dish" related standard in January this year. The definition of pre-prepared dishes in this document not only covers main ingredients and pre-processing methods but also explicitly defines them as pre-packaged dish products and standardizes a series of terms related to pre-prepared dishes. 作为全国预制菜产值第一大省，广东已出台 8 项省级地方标准，并于今年 1 月上线全国首个「预制菜」相关标准。 该文件中的预制菜定义，不仅涵盖了主要原料和预加工方式，还明确其为预包装菜肴产品，并规范了一系列预制菜相关术语。

Among them, the "General Requirements for Packaging and Labeling of Cantonese Pre-prepared Dishes" is the first local standard in the country to specify packaging and labeling for pre-prepared dishes. 其中，《粤菜预制菜包装标识通用要求》则是全国首个以预制菜为标准化对象制定的包装标识地方标准。

The standard requires that the product name must indicate "pre-prepared dish" or "pre-prepared cuisine." If a certain ingredient or component is mentioned in the product name, its input amount or content in the finished product should be indicated. At the same time, the standard also requires labeling of eating/cooking methods to ensure consumers can prepare food in the best way to achieve optimal taste and flavor. 该标准要求在产品名称上必须标示 「预制菜」「预制菜肴」，产品名称中提及的某种原料或成分，应标示该种原料或成分的投料量或其在成品中的含量。同时，标准还要求标注食用/烹饪方法，确保消费者能够按照最佳方式准备食物，获得最佳的口感和风味。

In addition, in July this year, the Hunan Provincial Market Supervision Bureau clearly stated in its reply to a CPPCC proposal that it would incorporate "explicitly indicating the use of pre-prepared dishes" into food safety operating standards and guide industry associations to formulate a "Disclosure Guide". 另外，今年 7 月，湖南省市场监管局在答复政协提案时明确，将把「明示预制菜使用情况」写入食品安全操作规范，并指导行业协会制定《公示指南》。

This means that whether it's fast food in shopping malls or high-end restaurants, as long as pre-prepared dishes are used, they must be clearly marked on menus, ordering pages, or prominent locations within the establishment. Violators will be considered to have provided "untrue information" and will face penalties. 这意味着，无论商场快餐还是高端酒楼，只要使用预制菜，都需在菜单、点餐页面或店内显著位置进行标注，违者将被视为「信息不真实」面临处罚。

A local market regulator stated that promoting the explicit indication of pre-prepared dishes in the catering sector, where businesses using them inform consumers in advance, is of great significance for protecting consumers' right to know and choose. To a certain extent, it can enhance catering businesses' ability to resist market risks, encourage pre-prepared dish manufacturers to actively research and improve products, and promote the healthy development of the pre-prepared dish industry. 一位地方市场监管人员表示，推广餐饮环节使用预制菜明示，使用预制菜的商家提前告知消费者，对保障消费者的知情权、选择权有重要意义，一定程度上能提高餐饮商家抗市场风险能力，推动预制菜生产企业积极研发改良产品，促进预制菜产业良性发展。

Regarding the "pre-prepared dish" dispute between Luo Yonghao and Xibei, food experts stated, "This incident is both bad and good for the pre-prepared dish industry. It will inevitably attract the attention of relevant government departments, promote the speedy introduction of national food safety standards for pre-prepared dishes, and simultaneously advance the popularization of quality standards such as pre-prepared dish terminology and product classification, strengthening their alignment with national food safety standards." 针对罗永浩与西贝的「预制菜」大战，食品领域的专家表示，「这次事件，对预制菜行业来讲是坏事也是好事，势必会引起政府有关部门的关注，促进预制菜食品安全国家标准尽快出台，同时推进预制菜术语、产品分类等质量标准的推广，加强与食品安全国家标准的衔接。」

Luo Yonghao also reposted the above content on September 13, stating, "Great, it's highly anticipated." He emphasized that he is not against pre-prepared dishes, "In some cases, I would even actively choose pre-prepared dishes." He also stated, "Since pre-prepared dishes are legal, restaurants certainly have the right to use them, but consumers have the right to know whether a restaurant has used pre-prepared dishes." 罗永浩也于 9 月 13 日转发上述内容并表示 「太好了，万众期待」。 其强调，自己不反对预制菜，「在某些情况下，我甚至会主动选择预制菜。」其也表示，「既然预制菜合法，餐馆当然有权使用预制菜，但消费者有权知道餐馆是否使用了预制菜。」

item.title: 库克：Air 续航出色，Pro 的 VC 均热板很创新
item.guid: 库克：Air-续航出色，Pro-的-VC-均热板很创新
item.description:
Recently, after the launch of the new iPhone, Apple CEO Tim Cook accepted interviews with multiple media outlets and shared his various views on the new iPhone. 日前，苹果 CEO 库克在新 iPhone 发布后，接受了多家媒体采访，并与大家分享了其对新 iPhone 的各种看法。

When CNBC reporter Jim Cramer asked Cook about the battery life performance of the iPhone Air, the latter said, "The battery life is excellent, you'll love it." Cook stated that Apple designed the interior of the iPhone Air, and thanks to eSIM-only support, the new phone's battery can extend into the area previously occupied by the physical SIM card slot, calling it "an incredible innovation." 在 CNBC 记者 Jim Cramer 询问库克 iPhone Air 的电池续航表现如何时，后者称 「电池续航出色，你会非常喜欢的。」 库克表示，苹果对 iPhone Air 的内部进行了设计，得益于仅支持 eSIM，新机的电池能扩展到此前放置物理 SIM 卡的卡槽区域，「这是一项令人难以置信的创新。」

In the interview videos released by Bilibili UP hosts Linksphotograph and Yingshi Jufeng, Cook appeared very excited when discussing the new VC liquid cooling vapor chamber technology on the iPhone 17 Pro series, stating, "I think this is another invention and innovation exclusive to Apple, perhaps only Apple can achieve it." 而在 B 站 UP 主 Linksphotograph、影视飓风公布的采访视频中，库克则在谈到 iPhone 17 Pro 系列新上的 VC 液冷均热板技术时，表现非常兴奋， 「我觉得这算是另一项专属于苹果的发明和创新，或许只有苹果才能够做到」。

Meanwhile, Cook also emphasized in the interview videos with Links and Yingshi Jufeng that the reason the iPhone 17 Pro series switched the mid-frame and back cover material from titanium alloy to aluminum alloy is that the latter has a thermal conductivity 20 times greater than the former, and it can also be lighter in weight. 同时，库克还在 Links 和影视飓风的采访视频中强调，iPhone 17 Pro 系列之所以将中框及后盖材质从钛合金换成铝合金，是因为后者导热系数是前者的 20 倍，并且重量能够更轻。

item.title: 雷军谈「黑公关」：法务部已起诉
item.guid: 雷军谈「黑公关」：法务部已起诉
item.description:
Recently, Lei Jun, founder of Xiaomi, reposted content from CCTV Finance's "Half-Hour Economy" on social media and published a post regarding the issue of "black PR" (malicious public relations). 日前，小米创办人雷军在社交媒体转发了央视财经《经济半小时》内容，并针对黑公关一事发文。

Lei Jun stated that "Half-Hour Economy" aired content exposing "black PR," and four car manufacturers—Xiaomi, Xpeng, Nio, and Deepal—were interviewed. 雷军表示，《经济半小时》播出了起底黑公关的内容，小米、小鹏、蔚来、深蓝四家车企接受了采访。

He emphasized that the methods used to spread rumors and defame various car manufacturers are highly similar, including AI-generated defamatory content, insulting car owners in comment sections, and smear campaigns against car products through press releases before new car launches. Some platforms even show different traffic for titles that guide positive or negative interpretations of the same content. 其强调，造谣抹黑各家车企的手段高度相似，都有 AI 生成造谣内容、评论区辱骂车主、新车发布前通稿抹黑车企产品等行为，甚至有平台对于相同内容正面负面不同引导的标题会有不同的流量呈现。

Lei Jun revealed that Xiaomi's legal department has collected evidence from hundreds of accounts this year, initiated dozens of lawsuits that are awaiting trial one by one, and multiple reported cases are also in the process of investigation. 雷军透露， 小米法务部今年已取证数百个账号，发起诉讼数十起，正在等待逐一开庭，多起报警的案件也正在办案过程中。

During the program, Li Xiaoshuang, Vice President of Xiaomi Auto, stated, "We must increase penalties for the actions of 'black astroturfers' and 'black PR.' From a regulatory perspective, we need to raise the cost and consequences for 'black astroturfers' and 'black PR.'" 而在节目中，小米汽车副总裁李肖爽表示，「要对黑水军、黑公关的行为，加大处罚力度。从监管的角度，去提高黑水军、黑公关的成本和代价。」

Lei Jun also stated that this joint special rectification action by six departments aims to combat "black PR" and "black astroturfers," requiring online platform companies to strengthen the identification and control of online astroturfers and "black mouths" who use generative AI technology, thereby creating a clean and clear industrial environment for the development of China's automotive industry. 雷军还表示，此次六部门联合专项整治行动，打击黑公关、黑水军，要求网络平台企业加强对采用生成式人工智能技术等的网络水军、黑嘴的甄别管控，为中国汽车发展构建风清气朗的产业环境。

item.title: 北京千所中小学校开设人工智能通识课
item.guid: 北京千所中小学校开设人工智能通识课
item.description:
According to a recent report by Beijing Daily, at the beginning of the autumn semester, more than 1,400 primary and secondary schools in Beijing fully launched general education courses in artificial intelligence, achieving full coverage for over 1.83 million primary and secondary school students citywide. 据北京日报日前报道，秋季学期伊始，北京市 1400 余所中小学全面开设人工智能通识教育课程，实现全市 183 万余名中小学生全覆盖。

The report stated that to ensure the effective implementation of the courses, Beijing has formed a multi-dimensional implementation path of "resource support, teacher empowerment, and balanced guarantee," deploying a "combination of measures," including: 报道表示，为确保课程落地见效，北京市形成「资源支撑、师资赋能、均衡保障」的立体化实施路径，打出一套「组合拳」，其中：

    In terms of curriculum resources, the first batch of 160 sets of municipal curriculum resources covering all academic stages has been launched. Each set includes approximately 15 minutes of core teaching videos, teaching guides, and activity task sheets;

    Through the "video + tool + task sheet" model, it meets the needs of three types of scenarios: teacher instruction, lesson preparation, and student self-study. It also establishes an AI "curriculum supermarket" and "application supermarket" to provide basic support for classroom teaching.

A relevant official from the Municipal Education Commission stated that Beijing will continue to optimize AI education curriculum resources, iterating and updating them based on teaching feedback; it will also carry out evaluations for application demonstration schools and promote excellent cases to form replicable experiences. 市教委相关负责人表示，北京市将持续优化人工智能教育课程资源，结合教学反馈迭代更新；开展应用示范校评选和优秀案例推广，形成可复制经验。

At the same time, the person in charge also stated that they will deepen the research and development of the "Jingwa" series of intelligent agents, expand "AI + education" application scenarios, etc., taking the first batch of curriculum resources as a starting point, striving to make Beijing primary and secondary school AI education a national benchmark, truly empowering every teacher and student with digital technology, and laying a solid foundation for cultivating new talents of the era who will undertake the great task of national rejuvenation. 同时，负责人还表示，要深化「京娃」系列智能体研发，拓展「AI + 教育」应用场景等，以首批课程资源为起点，力争将北京中小学人工智能教育打造成全国标杆，真正让数字技术赋能每一位师生，为培养担当民族复兴大任的时代新人奠定坚实基础。

item.title: 新方案：有条件批准 L3 级车型生产准入
item.guid: 新方案：有条件批准-L3-级车型生产准入
item.description:
Recently, according to news from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology's website, eight departments including the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology issued the "Work Plan for Stable Growth in the Automobile Industry (2025-2026)". It is understood that the main objectives of this plan are: 日前，据工信部网站消息，工业和信息化部等八部门印发《汽车行业稳增长工作方案（2025—2026 年）》。据悉，本次方案的主要目标为：

    In 2025, strive to achieve annual automobile sales of around 32.3 million units, a year-on-year increase of approximately 3%, with new energy vehicle sales of around 15.5 million units, a year-on-year increase of approximately 20%; maintain stable growth in automobile exports; and achieve a year-on-year increase of approximately 6% in the added value of the automobile manufacturing industry.

    In 2026, the industry operation will maintain a stable and positive development trend, with further improvements in industrial scale and quality efficiency.

It is worth mentioning that the plan mentions promoting the industrial application of intelligent connected technologies: 值得一提的是，方案中提到，将推动智能网联技术产业化应用：

    Promote pilot programs for intelligent connected vehicle access and road use, conditionally approve L3-level vehicle production access, and push for the improvement of road traffic safety, insurance, and other laws and regulations. Support enterprises in the automotive, information communication, and transportation industries to explore new business models with data as a link, and accelerate the cultivation of diversified value chains.

    Deepen the "vehicle-road-cloud integration" application pilot for intelligent connected vehicles, accelerate the construction of networked infrastructure and cloud control platforms, encourage the pre-installation of high-performance communication modules such as V2X and 5G in vehicles, accelerate the large-scale application of the Beidou system, promote multi-scenario applications such as logistics, sanitation, and travel services, and encourage key regions to gradually expand cross-regional collaborative applications.

In addition, the plan also states that efforts should be further intensified to promote automobile consumption, such as: 另外，方案中还表示，要进一步加大力度促进汽车消费，如：

    Support car trade-ins, the renewal of new energy city buses and power batteries, and promote tiered and updated consumption of automobiles;

    Carry out pilot reforms in automobile circulation and consumption, and expand after-market consumption such as car modification, leasing, racing, and RV camping;

    Encourage regions with car purchase restrictions to optimize these policies, gradually shifting from purchase management to usage management;

    Implement facilitating measures such as "reverse invoicing" for used car sales and inter-regional transaction registration, explore the establishment of online transaction management systems, strengthen information sharing and openness in the automotive sector, enhance the accuracy and authority of used car information inquiry platforms, and promote efficient circulation of used cars.

item.title: 蚂蚁开源发布新版全球大模型开源生态全景图
item.guid: 蚂蚁开源发布新版全球大模型开源生态全景图
item.description:
On September 13, at the 2025 Inclusion·Bund Summit AI Open Source Insights Forum, Ant Open Source, in conjunction with Inclusion AI, released the brand new "Global Large Model Open Source Development Ecosystem Panorama and Trends Report". 9 月 13 日，在 2025 Inclusion·外滩大会 AI 开源见解论坛上，蚂蚁开源联合 Inclusion AI 发布了全新的《全球大模型开源开发生态全景与趋势报告》。

This is the 2.0 version of the report, following its initial release in May. It not only comprehensively reveals the current status and future trends of AI open source development but also incorporates new developments in the open source community over the past hundred days, providing important references for industry development. 据悉，这是报告 5 月首次发布后的 2.0 版本， 不仅全面揭示了人工智能开源领域的发展现状和未来趋势，还纳入了百余天内开源社区的新动向，为行业发展提供重要参考。

The report originally stemmed from Ant Group's internal technical trend insights, with all data sourced from the open-source community. Projects were filtered and ranked using the OpenRank algorithm through analysis of GitHub's entire platform projects. 报告最初起源于蚂蚁集团内部的技术趋势洞察，其中的数据全部来源于开源社区，通过对 GitHub 全平台项目的分析，使用 OpenRank 算法对项目进行筛选和排名。

Specifically, the large model open-source development ecosystem panorama released this time includes 114 of the most-watched open-source projects distributed across 22 technical fields, categorized into two major technical directions: AI Agent and AI Infra. 具体来看，本次发布的大模型开源开发生态全景图共收录了分布在 22 个技术领域的 114 个最受关注的开源项目，分为 AI Agent 和 AI Infra 两大技术方向。

According to the report, among approximately 360,000 global developers participating in the panorama project, US developers accounted for 24%, Chinese developers for 18%, followed by India (8%), Germany (6%), and the UK (5%). China and the US together contribute over 40% of the core strength. More notably, regarding large model open-source strategies, Chinese manufacturers tend to favor open-weight open-source model routes, while leading US manufacturers mostly adopt closed-source models. 据报告显示，在参与全景图项目开发的约 36 万全球开发者中，统计到美国开发者占比 24%，中国开发者占比 18%，其次是印度（8%）、德国（6%）和英国（5%）。中美两国合计贡献超四成核心力量。更值得关注的是，在大模型开源策略上，中国厂商更倾向于开放权重的开源模型路线，而美国头部厂商则多采用闭源模式。

Released alongside the panorama is a detailed insights report, "Revisiting the Large Model Open Source Development Ecosystem Panorama and Trends from Community Data." The report points out that 62% of open-source projects within the large model ecosystem were born after the "GPT moment" in October 2022, with an average "age" of only 30 months, reflecting the rapid iteration characteristics of the AI open-source ecosystem. 和全景图一同发布的还有一份详尽的洞察报告《从社区数据出发，再看大模型开源开发生态全景与趋势》。该报告指出，62% 的大模型生态下的开源项目诞生于 2022 年 10 月「GPT 时刻」之后，平均「年龄」仅 30 个月，这反映出 AI 开源生态的高速迭代特性。

Furthermore, the explosive growth of AI programming tools has also become a notable trend. Data shows that newly emerging coding tools in 2025 have, on average, received over 30,000 developer stars, with Gemini CLI open-source gaining over 60,000 stars in just 3 months, making it one of the fastest-growing projects. 另外，AI 编程工具的爆发式增长也成为了瞩目的趋势。数据显示，2025 年新出现的 Coding 工具平均获得 3 万以上开发者 Star 关注，其中 Gemini CLI 开源仅 3 个月，星标数已突破 6 万，成为增长最快的项目之一。

item.title: 💡 DeepMind CEO：现在的模型有博士级水平？无稽之谈
item.guid: 💡-DeepMind-CEO：现在的模型有博士级水平？无稽之谈
item.description:
Recently, Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis pointed out during the "All In Summit" that he often hears some competitors claim that the modern systems we now possess have PhD-level intelligence. "But I think that claim is nonsense, because they simply don't possess PhD-level intelligence." 近日，Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis 在参加「All In 峰会」时指出，时常能听到一些竞争对手称，如今我们所拥有的这些现代系统具备博士级智能。「但我认为这种说法是无稽之谈，因为根本不具备博士级智能。」

According to OfficeChai, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman previously claimed that the GPT-5 model possesses "doctorate-level" capabilities, even stating at the press conference, "It's like talking to an expert, a true doctorate-level expert, in any field." 据 OfficeChai 指出，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 此前曾声称 GPT-5 模型 拥有「博士级」能力，甚至在发布会上表示「这就像是在和一个专家交谈，一个真正的博士级别的专家，在任何一个领域。」

However, in Hassabis's view, current AI systems are far from doctorate-level in terms of comprehensive capabilities. He stated: "In fact, it's well known that when interacting with today's chatbots, if you ask questions in a specific way, you'll find they even make elementary mistakes in high school math and simple counting problems. This should not happen for a true Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) system." 而在 Hassabis 看来，现阶段的 AI 系统在综合能力上与博士级水平相差甚远。其表示：「事实上，众所周知，与如今的聊天机器人互动时，只要你以特定方式提问，就会发现它们甚至会在高中数学和简单计数问题上犯低级错误。对于真正的通用人工智能（AGI）系统而言，这种情况是不应该出现的。」

At the same time, Hassabis also predicted that humanity might still need 5 to 10 years to develop an AI system capable of achieving doctorate-level comprehensive abilities. 同时 Hassabis 也预测， 要研发出能够实现博士级综合能力的人工智能系统，人类可能还需要 5 到 10 年的时间。

Hassabis also mentioned that current model systems do not yet possess human-like learning capabilities. He believes that another critical missing ability at this stage is continuous learning — the ability to teach new knowledge to the system online or to adjust its behavioral patterns in some way. Hassabis 还提到，当前的模型系统尚不具备人类这样的学习能力，他认为，现阶段另一个缺失的关键能力是持续学习能力 —— 即能够在线向系统传授新知识，或通过某种方式调整其行为模式的能力。

He stated that most of these core capabilities have not yet been realized. "Perhaps through scaling, humanity can achieve the goal, but if I were to bet, I think achieving this goal might still require one or two key breakthroughs, and these breakthroughs are expected to emerge in the next five years or so." 其表示，目前这些核心能力中的大部分仍未实现。「或许通过规模扩张人类能达成目标，但如果让我打赌的话，我认为要实现这一目标，可能还需要一两项关键突破，而这些突破有望在未来五年左右出现。」

item.title: 新 iPhone 过后，苹果还准备了几款新品
item.guid: 新-iPhone-过后，苹果还准备了几款新品
item.description:
Last week, Apple unveiled several highly anticipated products at its past autumn new product launch event: the all-new iPhone 17 series, iPhone Air, the next-generation Apple Watch series, and AirPods Pro 3. 上周，苹果已经在过去的秋季新品发布会发布了多款备受期待的产品：全新的 iPhone 17 系列、iPhone Air、新一代 Apple Watch 系列以及 AirPods Pro 3。

Last night, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman published an article stating that Apple also plans to introduce the following new products in the coming months. 昨晚，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 发文表示，苹果在未来几个月还计划会带来以下新品。

Gurman predicted that Apple will enter the smart glasses market within the next 1-1.5 years , consistent with previous reports: first launching a display-less version, targeting Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses; followed by an AR display version that can use software and view data, but this will require a few years of waiting. Gurman 预测， 苹果将会在未来 1-1.5 年内入局智能眼镜市场 ，并且和此前的消息保持一致：先推出无显示屏版本，针对 Ray-Ban Meta 智能眼镜；后续推出能使用软件以及查看数据的 AR 带屏显示版，但需要等待几年时间。

He believes that, given Apple's ability to deeply integrate devices with the iPhone, and other brands like Meta being limited by the Apple ecosystem from fully showcasing their capabilities, Apple's smart glasses will be very successful. 其认为， 鉴于苹果能将设备与 iPhone 深度结合，而 Meta 等其他品牌受限于苹果生态没能施展全部实力，因此苹果智能眼镜将会非常成功。

However, according to Gurman, Meta will release a display-equipped version of smart glasses priced at $800 (approximately 5699 RMB) next week, and by 2027, Meta will go a step further — launching its first true AR glasses. 但据 Gurman 透露，Meta 将会在下周发布一款售价 800 美元（约合人民币 5699 元）的带屏版智能眼镜，而到了 2027 年，Meta 会更进一步 —— 推出其首款真正的 AR 眼镜。

Additionally, Gurman once again revealed the products Apple plans to launch in the coming months in this report: 另外，Gurman 还在本期报道中再次透露了苹果未来几个月将要推出的产品：

    M5 iPad Pro: Planned for an October release, debuting as the first model with the M5 chip; in addition to processor improvements, Apple may also add a front-facing camera for selfies (similar to previous front cameras placed on the shorter side of the screen).

    Vision Pro: Will feature a more powerful processor and a new head strap, but Gurman noted that "this is not the true Vision Pro 2" — Apple plans to launch the actual second-generation product in 2027, with a lighter and thinner body.

    AirTag 2: Upgraded wireless chip, supporting a longer search range and stronger discoverability.

    Apple TV: Equipped with a more powerful processor (the current Apple TV 4K has an A15 processor) and introducing the same N1 wireless network chip as the new iPhone.

    HomePod mini: Will also get a chip upgrade and introduce new color options.

    iPhone 17e: Following the same path as the iPhone 16e — upgraded to the same A19 processor as the iPhone 17.

    Smart Home Hub: Expected to launch next spring alongside the next-generation Siri (originally planned for last March).

item.title: 魅族 22 配备全新 AI 按键
item.description:
Recently, Meizu continued to tease its new phone, the "Meizu 22": 日前，魅族继续预热其新机「魅族 22」：

    Equipped with a brand-new AI button, featuring an anti-mistouch design, supporting AI one-click collection, and enabling one-click activation of 20+ shortcut functions;

    Equipped with Flyme AIOS 2, supporting features such as aggregated multi-application information and services, and the new small window mode 5.0;

    Adopts a borderless super antenna architecture with a surround antenna layout;

    Supports UWB digital key, Flyme Link car-hand interconnection, and DP 1.2 interface direct connection (16GB+1TB version only).

Meizu 22 will be released on September 15th, featuring a 6.3-inch body, a square rear camera module in the upper left corner, a 2.5D micro-arc front cover, and a 3D equally deep quad-curved back cover (with a floating design); the device weighs 190g, is 8.15mm thick, and boasts a 50:50 balanced design. 魅族 22 将于 9 月 15 日发布，机身尺寸为 6.3 英寸，采用左上角方形后置摄像头模组和 2.5D 微弧正面盖板以及 3D 等深四曲面后盖（并采用悬浮式设计）；机身重量为 190g，厚度为 8.15mm，拥有 50:50 平衡设计。

In terms of imaging, Meizu 22 will be equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera, with the main camera using a full-blooded OV50H sensor; the 3x periscope telephoto lens uses an IMX882 sensor, supporting 15cm telephoto macro; and the ultra-wide-angle lens uses an OV50D sensor. 影像表现上，魅族 22 将配备后置 5000 万像素三摄，主摄采用 OV50H 满血版传感器；潜望 3 倍长焦为 IMX882 传感器，支持 15cm 长焦微距；超广角为 OV50D 传感器。

In other aspects, Meizu 22 is equipped with Qualcomm's fourth-generation Snapdragon 8s processor and provides a 4500mm² VC liquid cooling system. 其他方面，魅族 22 配备高通第四代骁龙 8s 处理器，提供 4500mm² 的 VC 液冷散热系统。

item.title: 小鹏 G7 增程版亮相
item.description:
Recently, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology officially announced news about the Xpeng G7 extended-range version, and subsequently, Xpeng founder and chairman He Xiaopeng posted to reveal more information. 日前，工信部官方正式公示了小鹏 G7 增程版消息，随后小鹏创始人董事长何小鹏发文透露了更多信息。

He Xiaopeng stated that the Xpeng G7 Super Extended-Range version is also Xpeng's first extended-range SUV model. According to him, the extended-range G7, consistent with the first model of Xpeng's Super Extended-Range family, the X9, will feature an 800V high-voltage platform architecture + 5C super-charging AI battery, and boast a pure electric range of up to 430km. 何小鹏表示， 小鹏 G7 超级增程版也是小鹏首款增程 SUV 车型。 据其透露，增程版 G7 与小鹏超级增程家族的首款车型 X9 一致，将搭载全域 800V 高压平台架构 + 5C 超充 AI 电池，并且拥有长达 430km 的纯电续航里程。

From the officially released images, the new car's exterior does not differ much from the pure electric G7. The front grille adopts a design similar to the extended-range X9, with a larger and more prominent overall opening area compared to the pure electric version. 从官方公布的图片来看，新车外观与纯电版 G7 变化不大，前脸的进气格栅采用了与增程版 X9 类似的设计，整体开口面积较纯电版更大更明显。

According to information from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, the new car is equipped with Dong'an Power's DAM15NTE 1.5L range extender, with a maximum power of 110kW. The peak power of the drive motor reaches 218kW, and the combined power is 440 horsepower. 据工信部信息显示，新车搭载了东安动力的 DAM15NTE 的 1.5L 增程器，最大功率 110kW，驱动电机的峰值功率则达到了 218kW，综合功率有 440 马力。

In terms of body dimensions, the G7 extended-range version has a length/width/height of 4918/1925/1655 mm and a wheelbase of 2890 mm. There isn't much change compared to the pure electric version, only an increase of more than 2 centimeters in length. 车身尺寸方面，G7 增程版的长宽高为 4918/1925/1655 毫米，轴距 2890 毫米，和纯电版相比没有太多变化，只是车长多了 2 厘米多。

Additionally, according to Yiche reports, He Xiaopeng recently predicted in an interview that future automotive companies' annual R&D investment will reach 50 billion yuan, with 30 billion yuan allocated to the AI sector. He stated that Xpeng will strive to achieve profitability in the fourth quarter and believes that "cars will be a technology industry in the future, not just a manufacturing industry." 另外，据易车报道，何小鹏日前在接受采访时预测，未来汽车公司的年研发投入将达 500 亿元，其中 300 亿元将用于 AI 领域。他表示，小鹏四季度将努力实现盈利，并相信「汽车将来是科技产业，不只是制造产业」。

item.title: 华为天际通 Go 小程序 eSIM 服务将于三季度上线
item.guid: 华为天际通-Go-小程序-eSIM-服务将于三季度上线
item.description:
This month, Huawei SkyTone Go WeChat mini-program showed that it already supports eSIM services and allows adding eSIM devices. Recently, Huawei provided detailed explanations for the SkyTone Go mini-program's eSIM service. 本月，华为天际通 Go 微信小程序显示，其已支持 eSIM 服务，并可添加 eSIM 设备。而在近期，华为对天际通 Go 小程序 eSIM 服务进行了详细解答。

According to reports, the SkyTone Go mini-program eSIM service is a feature currently under development, in its internal testing phase, and is expected to be officially launched in the third quarter of 2025. 据介绍， 天际通 Go 小程序 eSIM 服务是正在开发中的一个功能，目前处于内测阶段，预计在 2025 年第三季度正式上线。

Regarding device usage, the official statement is that "currently supported devices are not yet on the market"; concerning "directly replacing a SIM card with an eSIM service," the official statement is that it is not supported, and eSIM services must be used on devices that support eSIM capabilities. 设备使用上，官方表示「目前支持设备暂未上市」；针对「直接将 SIM 卡换成 eSIM 服务」，官方表示不支持，并且 eSIM 服务需在支持 eSIM 能力的设备上使用。

item.title: 西贝暂停后厨参观，创始人发文道歉
item.guid: 西贝暂停后厨参观，创始人发文道歉
item.description:
Recently, Luo Yonghao posted complaints about Xibei's "pre-made dishes" and "high prices," leading to several days of online "battles" between the two parties: 近期，罗永浩发文吐槽西贝「预制菜」和「价格贵」，双方连续多日在线隔空「对战」：

    Luo Yonghao conducted multi-platform live broadcasts regarding the "pre-made dishes" issue, stating that Xibei's claim of having no pre-made dishes was a 100% lie;

    Xibei, in response to Luo Yonghao's complaints, held a press conference and issued a strong rebuttal, stating that "none of the dishes Luo Yonghao ordered that day were pre-made"; founder Jia Guolong even declared, "We will definitely sue him (Luo Yonghao)."

    On September 12th, Xibei also released "A Letter to Customers from All Xibei Partners," responding to the doubts point by point, disclosing the detailed production processes for the 13 dishes in question, and citing documents from six ministries and commissions to state that these dishes do not fall under the category of "pre-made dishes"; it also announced that kitchen tours would be open to customers starting that day.

On the evening of September 13th, Luo Yonghao posted an announcement that this "battle" had come to an end, stating, "I need to get back to serious work; some tasks have already been delayed. Thank you all for your concern." 9 月 13 日晚，罗永浩发文宣布本次「对战」告一段落，并表示「我要忙正事了，已经耽误了一些工作。感谢大家的关心。 」

According to Sina Finance, Xibei announced an internal notice at noon on September 14, deciding to suspend kitchen tours at its stores. According to store staff, this is mainly to ensure the normal operation of the kitchen. 而据新浪财经消息，西贝方面于 9 月 14 日中午发布内部通知， 决定暂停门店后厨的参观活动。 据门店店员表示，主要为了保证后厨的正常运营。

It's worth noting that, according to reports, some store managers stated that "(customer traffic) has not decreased but increased, with even more customers." The report claims that during lunchtime, some stores were almost at full capacity. 值得一提的是，据报道走访获悉，有门店店长表示「（客流量）不降反增，客人反而更多了。」报道称，部分门店中，午饭时间到店用餐的顾客也已经接近满客状态。

Meanwhile, a head chef stated in the report that he has worked as a chef for Xibei and other restaurants, and is particularly confident in Xibei's kitchen food safety, hygiene, and operational safety. "If Xibei's dishes are unclean, poor quality, or service is bad, then I believe there's no clean food industry left." 同时有厨师长通过报道表示，自己不仅干过西贝的厨师，也干过外面的厨师，对西贝厨房的食品安全、厨房卫生、操作安全都特别有自信。 「如果说西贝的菜品不干净，菜品不好，服务态度不好，那我认为食品行业也没有干净的了。」

Regarding the doubts about pre-made dishes, the store manager and head chef cited the "Pre-made Dish Food Safety Supervision" of 2024, stating that chain catering enterprises widely use the central kitchen model, and the prepared vegetables, semi-finished products, and finished dishes they produce and distribute to their own stores do not belong to pre-made dishes. "Our stores do not have pre-made dishes." 针对预制菜质疑，店长和厨师长则援引 2024 年的《预制菜食品安全监管》表示，连锁餐饮企业广泛应用中央厨房模式，自行制作并向自有门店配送的净菜、半成品、成品菜肴，均不属于预制菜。「我们的门店是没有预制菜的。」

Last night, Jia Guolong's apology message was leaked. The released information shows that Jia Guolong stated in the content that his response method was wrong , saying, "The cook revolves around the diner; whatever you say is good, that's what we'll do. Customers abuse me a thousand times, but I treat them like first love." He also stated, "From now on, Xibei will play with open cards, becoming a transparent Xibei, thoroughly learning from Pang Donglai." 昨晚，贾国龙的道歉信息流出。从公布的信息显示， 贾国龙在内容中表示自己应对方式有错 ，「做饭的围着吃饭的转，你说咋好就咋办。顾客虐我千百遍，我待顾客如初恋。」其还表示，「西贝从今以后打明牌，做一个透明的西贝彻彻底底向胖东来学习。」

However, it was later revealed that the screenshot was not the complete version. According to the full version, Jia Guolong also added the following content to the message: 但随后被扒出该截图并非完整版本。而据完整版本显示，贾国龙还在消息后续添加了以下内容：

Luo Yonghao is an online troll, an online gangster, too bad. But he woke me up, which can be considered indirectly helping Xibei improve.

Luo Yonghao also responded later, "Alright, Jia Guolong, then we can't let this matter go." 罗永浩也随后发文回应， 「好，贾国龙，那这件事我们没法揭过去了。」

item.title: 任天堂直面会公布多款新游戏
item.guid: 任天堂直面会公布多款新游戏
item.description:
Recently, Nintendo held a Direct presentation and announced a series of news: 日前，任天堂举办直面会，并在会上公布了一系列消息：

  • A new trailer for the new movie "Super Mario Galaxy" has been released, and the film will be released in April 2026; 全新电影《超级马里奥银河》公布全新预告，电影将于 2026 年 4 月上映；
  • The trailer for "Stardew Valley" Switch 2 version has been officially released; according to producer ConcernedApe, the Switch version supports a free upgrade to the Switch 2 version, but Japanese players will need to pay for the upgrade due to local regulations; 《星露谷物语》Switch 2 版预告正式公布；据制作人 ConcernedApe 透露，Switch 版支持免费升级至 Switch 2 版，但日本玩家因本地法规，需要付费升级；
  • "Metroid Prime 4: Beyond" will be released on December 4, coming to Switch/Switch 2; 《银河战士 Prime4：超越》将于 12 月 4 日发售，登陆 Switch/Switch 2；
  • "Resident Evil 9: Requiem" will be released on February 27, and "Resident Evil 7/8" will also be available on Switch 2; 《生化危机 9：安魂曲》将于 2 月 27 日发售，同时《生化危机 7/8》也将登陆 Switch 2；
  • New gameplay footage for "Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity" has been revealed and will be available on Switch 2 on November 6; 《塞尔达无双封印战记》新实机画面公开，并将于 11 月 6 日登陆 Switch 2；
  • The Switch 2 version of "Final Fantasy VII Remake" has been announced and will be released on January 22, 2026, with both physical and digital editions. 《最终幻想 7 重制版》Switch 2 版公布，将于 2026 年 1 月 22 日登陆，发行实体及数字版。

item.title: 《原神》新角色遭网友质疑「着装暴露」
item.guid: 《原神》新角色遭网友质疑「着装暴露」
item.description:
Recently, "Genshin Impact: Song of the Azure Moon" Version 6.0 was officially launched. 日前，《原神·空月之歌》6.0 版本正式上线。

According to Jimu News, some netizens questioned that the new Dendro character "Laum" in the game is dressed too revealingly, appearing "as if not wearing clothes" from a side view. This is severely inconsistent with Genshin Impact's 12+ age rating and may mislead the aesthetics and values of teenagers. 而据极目新闻报道，有网友质疑，游戏中的新草系角色「菈乌玛」着装太过暴露，从侧面视角看「仿佛未穿着衣物」，这与《原神》12+ 的年龄分级严重不符，可能对青少年审美和价值观产生误导。

The report points out that a large image of Laum can be seen on the game's official website, with her side almost completely uncovered and a large area of her chest exposed. According to official information, the character Laum, as the "Child of the Frost Moon," is the High Priestess of Nordkalai, and her design references the Norse goddess of fertility. 报道指出，在该游戏官网上可以看到菈乌玛的大幅图片，其侧面几乎没有遮挡，胸部也大面积裸露。据官方资料，角色菈乌玛作为「霜月之子」，是挪德卡莱的大祭司，形象设计参考北欧生育女神。

Many netizens posted screenshots in the comment section of their reports to the cyberspace administration, stating that many players of this game are minors, and such vulgar attire for female characters would have an adverse effect on minors, hoping that the game's publisher can modify the character's clothing. 许多网友在评论区贴出自己向网信部门举报的截图，表示这款游戏玩家中，有不少都是未成年人，女性角色这种低俗穿搭，会对未成年人造成不利影响，希望游戏出品方能修改角色着装。

According to reports, when miHoYo's customer service was called, a staff member stated that they had received feedback from some players regarding character attire issues and had recorded them. 而据报道致电米哈游公司客服，一工作人员表示，已接到一些玩家反映的角色着装问题，她们已记录下来。

item.title: lululemon 举办「Scuba 动态剧场」，庆祝 2025 天猫超级品牌日
item.guid: lululemon-举办「Scuba-动态剧场」，庆祝-2025-天猫超级品牌日
item.description:
Recently, to celebrate the 2025 Tmall Super Brand Day and its tenth anniversary of joining Tmall, the athletic lifestyle brand lululemon chose the Hangzhou World Tourism Expo Center to creatively present the 'Scuba™ Dynamic Theater'. 日前，为庆祝 2025 天猫超级品牌日以及入驻天猫十周年，运动生活方式品牌 lululemon 选址杭州世界旅游博览馆，创意呈现「Scuba™ 动态剧场」。

It is reported that lululemon brand ambassador, singer-songwriter Amber Liu, actor and singer Dong Sicheng, and actress Xia Meng made a surprise appearance by Xianghu Lake. Synchronized swimming world champions Wang Liuyi and Wang Qianyi, along with Lin Yanhan and Lin Yanjun, made their cheerleading crossover debut, joining four university champion teams to deliver a vibrant performance. 据悉，lululemon 品牌大使、音乐唱作人刘逸云 Amber Liu，演员及歌手董思成，演员夏梦惊喜亮相湘湖畔，花样游泳世界冠军王柳懿、王芊懿与林彦含、林彦君首次跨界啦啦操，与四支高校冠军队共同奉上了一场青春洋溢的演出。

Wang Liuyi and Wang Qianyi said: 'During our usual training, lululemon's athletic gear is our great partner; in daily life, we also often wear the Scuba™ series. The skin-friendly fabric and loose fit feel just right, especially in this early autumn season, wearing it makes us feel full of energy.' 王柳懿和王芊懿说：「平时训练中，lululemon 的运动装备是我们的好搭档；日常生活中，我们也经常穿 Scuba™ 系列，亲肤的面料和宽松的剪裁让人觉得刚刚好，特别在这个初秋的季节，穿上后感觉充满元气。」

The official statement indicates that the Scuba™ series and Steady State™ series will offer more colorways and style options this autumn. The lululemon Tmall Super Brand Day officially went on sale from September 12th to September 18th. 官方表示，Scuba™ 系列与 Steady State™ 系列将会在这个秋季带来更多配色和款式选择。lululemon 天猫超级品牌日已于 9 月 12 日 – 9 月 18 日期间正式开售。

item.title: 中国核电催更《流浪地球 3》
item.guid: 中国核电催更《流浪地球-3》
item.description:
On September 12th, Guo Fan, director of 'The Wandering Earth' series, posted that 'After twenty-three months, the script for the third installment, comprising two parts and a total of 150,000 words, has finally been completed.' Guo Fan also revealed in the comments section that the script would undergo minor revisions, with the upper part currently in its twelfth major revision and the lower part in its fourteenth major revision. 9 月 12 日，《流浪地球》系列导演郭帆发文表示，「历经二十三个月，第三部上下集，共计十五万字的剧本终于全部完稿。」郭帆还在评论区透露，剧本还会小改，目前，上集大改是第十二版，下集大改是第十四版。

It is worth mentioning that on the day Guo Fan officially announced the completion of the third script, China Nuclear Power's official account online 'urged for updates' on 'The Wandering Earth 3,' stating: 'If you don't finish filming, we'll have to show our stuff.' Guo Fan later responded, 'You can't bully people like that.' 值得一提的是，中国核电官方在郭帆官宣第三部剧本完稿当日，在线「催更」了《流浪地球 3》：「再不拍完我们就要亮家伙了。」随后郭帆表示「不带这么欺负人的。」

It is reported that 'The Wandering Earth,' as a domestic sci-fi blockbuster, is set in 2075 and tells the story of the sun's impending destruction and humanity's launch of the 'Wandering Earth' project to find a new home. It's worth noting that many high-tech devices from the film have already appeared in reality, leading some netizens to jokingly call 'The Wandering Earth' a period drama or a documentary. 据悉，《流浪地球》作为国产科幻大片，其故事背景设定在 2075 年，讲述了太阳即将毁灭，人类将开启「流浪地球」计划寻找新家园的故事。值得一提的是，电影中不少高科技设备已经在现实亮相，以至于有网友调侃《流浪地球》是古装片、纪录片。

According to IT Home, the News Center of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council and CCTV Military also directly expressed similar views that 'the scenes in 'The Wandering Earth' are no longer so sci-fi.' Coupled with the interaction between China Nuclear Power and director Guo Fan, it's not ruled out that China Nuclear Energy Power's official channels may have significant new technologies awaiting unveiling/announcement. 而据 IT 之家报道，国务院国资委新闻中心、央视军事官方也曾直接表达过「《流浪地球》场面不再那么科幻」的类似观点。再结合此次中国核电与郭帆导演的互动来看，不排除中国核能电力官方有待亮相 / 公布的重磅新技术的可能性。

item.title: 「金熊猫奖」获奖名单公布
item.description:
According to Sina Film, the second Golden Panda Awards officially announced its list of winners: 据新浪电影消息，第二届金熊猫奖正式公布获奖名单：

    Film Category: 'There's Always Tomorrow' won Best Picture; Zhu Yilong won Best Actor for 'A River Runs Through It'; Delice Weinberg won Best Actress for 'The Other Side of the Sky'.

    Drama Series Category: 'When the Mountain Flowers Bloom' won Best Drama Series; Tiffany Tang won Best Actress for 'Blossoms Shanghai'; Francis Ng won Best Actor for 'The Water's Edge'.

Regarding other awards: 其他奖项方面：

    Film Category: Trine Dyrholm for 'The Girl with the Needle' won Best Supporting Actress; Jack Tan for 'Abang Adik' won Best Supporting Actor; Azamat Dulatov for 'Running to the Sky' won Best Cinematography; Nuri Bilge Ceylan, Ebru Ceylan, and Akın Aksu for 'About Dry Grasses' won Best Screenplay.

    Drama Series Category: Sarah Greene for 'Bad Sisters' won Best Supporting Actress; Guo Xiaodong for 'People in the Alley' won Best Supporting Actor; Adriano Goldman, Ben Wilson, Sophia Olsson, Rasmus Videbæk for 'The Crown Season 6' won Best Cinematography; Best Screenplay Award: Yuan Zidan, Ding Han, Huang Shiyang, Li Xiwei for 'When the Mountain Flowers Bloom' won Best Screenplay.

Additionally, in the Animation Category, 'Nezha: The Devil Boy's Sea Battle' won the 'Best Animated Film Award,' while 'Chang An' and 'Tainá and the Amazon's Guardians' won the Best Animated Visual Effects Award and Best Animated Character Award, respectively. 另外，动画片单元「最佳动画片奖」由《哪吒之魔童闹海》获得，《长安三万里》和《塔伊纳和亚马孙守护者》分别获得最佳动画视觉效果奖和最佳动画形象奖。

item.title: 古天乐新片《临时决斗》定档
item.guid: 古天乐新片《临时决斗》定档
item.description:
Recently, 'Temporary Duel,' the 2025 Chinese Hong Kong Lunar New Year box office champion, released its official poster and is set to be released on September 19th. 日前，2025 年中国香港春节档票房冠军《临时决斗》发布定档海报，将于 9 月 19 日上映。

The film tells the story of Zhong Lei, a former legendary boxing champion who founded the 'Zhong Lei Gym,' which is now struggling with poor business and on the verge of bankruptcy. Mo Jiali, a once-glamorous superstar, retired from acting years ago and is now attempting a comeback, facing a 'midlife crisis.' Lin Xue, an elite woman in the advertising industry, discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with female boxing champion Sun Yayun. She fiercely challenges Sun Yayun, vowing to defeat her. The several individuals, through a difficult yet meaningful Muay Thai training journey, regain control of their lives. 影片讲述曾经的传奇拳王钟磊创立拳馆「钟磊舍」，如今却生意冷清，濒临倒闭。风光一时的大明星莫嘉莉息影多年，如今试图复出，却面临「中年困境」。广告界女精英林雪发现男友劈腿女拳王孙雅云，她狠下战书，誓要与孙雅云决一胜负。几人在一段艰难却意义非凡的泰拳训练旅程中，重新掌握了自己的人生。

The film is directed by Mak Kai-kwong and stars Louis Koo, Gigi Leung, Chrissie Chau, Louise Wong, Philip Ng, Tony Wu, and Jacky Cheung, among others. It was released in Hong Kong, China, on January 28, 2025. 该片由麦启光执导，古天乐、梁咏琪、周秀娜、王丹妮、伍允龙、胡子彤、张文杰等人主演，于 2025 年 1 月 28 日中国香港上映。
